category.dldescription: Type of Observation recorded - Block, Paddock, Field or Grazing

date.dldescription: Date (and depending on Observation, time) at which the Observation was made. For some events, the time component of the Observation is critical (for instance, a Milk Yield Observation). For others, (such as condition score), the rate of change is slow enough that time is irrelevant.

blockId.dldescription: Identifier for the block being assessed.Usuually recorded as a block number or code used by the farm

identifiers.dldescription: A code used by the source system to identify the farm, such as an internally meaningful identifier

items.dldescription: Reference to access details of the Observation Items recorded
